DDL.SQL: CREATE TABLE friends (id INT(32), friend INT(32), PRIMARY KEY (id, friend))
CREATE TABLE users (id INT(32), age INT(32), name VARCHAR(40), address VARCHAR(40), PRIMARY KEY(id))
CREATE TABLE votes (aid INT(32), uid INT(32), comment_id INT(32), sign INT(32),  PRIMARY KEY (aid, uid))
CREATE TABLE articles (id INT(32), author INT(32), title VARCHAR(40), PRIMARY KEY (id))
CREATE TABLE f2 (friend INT(32), id INT(32), PRIMARY KEY (id))

Queries.SQL: SELECT sum(votes.sign) AS sum FROM votes GROUP BY votes.uid HAVING sum > 0
SELECT count(votes.uid) AS vc FROM votes GROUP BY votes.aid
SELECT users.id FROM users
SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users WHERE users.address = ?
SELECT sum(votes.sign) AS sum FROM votes GROUP BY votes.uid HAVING sum > 0
SELECT users.name FROM users WHERE users.id = 42
SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users
SELECT sum(votes.sign) AS sum FROM votes WHERE votes.aid = 5 GROUP BY votes.uid
SELECT users.name, articles.title, votes.uid FROM articles JOIN users ON users.id = articles.author JOIN votes ON votes.aid = articles.id
SELECT sum(votes.sign) AS sum FROM votes WHERE votes.sign > 0 GROUP BY votes.uid
SELECT count(votes.uid) AS vc FROM votes GROUP BY votes.aid HAVING vc > 5
SELECT users.name, articles.title FROM articles, users WHERE users.id = articles.author
SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users WHERE users.name = ? AND users.id = ?
SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users WHERE users.id = 32
SELECT sum(CASE WHEN votes.aid = 5 THEN votes.sign END) AS sum FROM votes GROUP BY votes.uid
SELECT count(votes.aid) AS count FROM votes GROUP BY votes.uid
SELECT count(votes.uid) AS count FROM votes
SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users WHERE users.id = 42
SELECT count(votes.uid) AS vc FROM votes GROUP BY votes.aid HAVING vc > 5
SELECT users.name, users.id FROM users WHERE users.id = 42
SELECT users.name, articles.title, votes.uid FROM articles, users, votes WHERE users.id = articles.author AND votes.aid = articles.id
SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users WHERE users.id = 50
SELECT count(CASE WHEN votes.aid = NULL AND votes.sign = 0 THEN votes.sign END) AS votes FROM votes GROUP BY votes.comment_id
SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users WHERE users.id = 42 AND users.name = 'bob'
SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users WHERE users.name = ?
SELECT sum(votes.sign) AS sum FROM votes GROUP BY votes.uid HAVING sum > 0
SELECT users.name, 1 FROM users
SELECT count(CASE WHEN votes.aid = 5 THEN votes.aid END) AS count FROM votes GROUP BY votes.uid
SELECT count(votes.uid) AS votes FROM votes GROUP BY votes.aid
SELECT sum(CASE WHEN votes.aid = 5 THEN votes.sign ELSE 6 END) AS sum FROM votes GROUP BY votes.uid
SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users WHERE users.id = 32 UNION DISTINCT SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users WHERE users.id = 42 AND users.name = 'bob'
SELECT users.id, users.name FROM users WHERE users.id = ?
SELECT friends.id, friends.friend FROM friends
SELECT 2 * users.age, 2 * 10 AS twenty FROM users
